About

The Harris School of Public Policy is commited to cultivating data driven policy makers. We hope to facilitate this goal by creating a resource for sharing policy-relevant datasets that have been accumulated and used by researchers within the University Community.

This project was developed by Allison Von Borstel and Nick Tallant, under the direction of Jamie Saxon and Bevis Pardee.

Data Census

  • Data Census
  • ndtallant
  • HarrisPolicy

This project aims to facilitate the Harris' mission by creating a resource for sharing policy-relevant datasets that have been accumulated, cleaned up, and purchased by researchers around the University Community.
